quote: Do it now and ask for forgiveness later is terrible advice. So much of what we do is nuanced and requires conversations before actions.
why_clipworthy: Challenges a common piece of advice with a thoughtful perspective on the importance of communication.
suggested_hook: Why 'ask for forgiveness later' is the worst advice in real estate.

quote: After a conversation, send a summary email to ensure everyone is on the same page.
why_clipworthy: Provides a simple yet powerful tactic for improving communication and accountability.
suggested_hook: The one email that can transform your client relationships.
